text:
January 4, 2017

        Introduced  by Sen. SQUAREPANTS -- read twice and ordered printed, and
          when printed to be committed to the Committee on Nonsense

        AN ACT to amend the dairy law, in relation to  giving  and/or  receiving
          unlawful ice cream cones
html:
January 4, 2017
                                       ___________

        Introduced  by Sen. SQUAREPANTS -- read twice and ordered printed, and
          when printed to be committed to the Committee on Nonsense

        AN ACT to amend the dairy law, in relation to  giving  and/or  receiving
          unlawful ice cream cones

text: The  People of the State of New York, represented in Senate and Assem-
html: The  People of the State of New York, represented in Senate and Assem-
bly, do enact as follows:

text:
1    Section 1. The dairy law is amended by adding a new section 000.00  to
     2  read as follows:
     3
html:
1    Section 1. The dairy law is amended by adding a new section 000.00  to
     2  read as follows:
     3
§ 000.00 Giving unlawful cones.

text: Anyone  who otherwise than as provided by law for the proper discharge
html: Anyone  who otherwise than as provided by law for the proper discharge

text: of coned ice cream directly or indirectly gives, offers or promises  any
html: of coned ice cream directly or indirectly gives, offers or promises  any

text: cone with a value in excess of     one      million    cookies, with the
html: cone with a value in excess of     one      million    cookies, with the

text: exception of  cookie dough as  defined  under  article  umpteen  of  the
html: exception of  cookie dough as  defined  under  article  umpteen  of  the

text: baked goods law,  to any public official or goat selected to be a public
html: baked goods law,  to any public official or goat selected to be a public

text: official because of that goat's official position.
html: official because of that goat's official position.

text: Giving unlawful ice cream  is a class Z felony.
html: Giving unlawful ice cream  is a class Z felony.

    13

11    § 2. The dairy law is amended by adding a new section 000.00  to  read
    12  as follows:

§ 000.00 Receiving unlawful cones.

text: Anyone  who, being  a public official or goat selected  to be a public
html: Anyone  who, being  a public official or goat selected  to be a public

text: official, otherwise than as provided by law for the proper discharge  of
html: official, otherwise than as provided by law for the proper discharge  of

text: coned ice cream,  directly or  indirectly  seeks,  receives or agrees to
html: coned ice cream,  directly or  indirectly  seeks,  receives or agrees to

text: receive any ice cream, with the exception of cookie dough provided udder
html: receive any ice cream, with the exception of cookie dough provided udder

text: article umpteen of the baked goods law, with a value in excess of    one
html: article umpteen of the baked goods law, with a value in excess of    one

text: million     cookies because of that goat's official position.
html: million     cookies because of that goat's official position.

text: Receiving unlawful cones is a class Z felony.
html: Receiving unlawful cones is a class Z felony.
